source_caption_data.pre_caption: From a first-person perspective, the camera-wearer's lower body and helmet occupy the foreground at the bottom of the frame. A second skydiver is positioned in the center of the frame in the middle ground, with a vast, arid landscape filling the background. The camera is positioned directly above this second person, looking down. As the video progresses, the camera-wearer extends their legs, which move from the bottom center to frame the sides of the shot. Simultaneously, the second skydiver, while remaining in the center, recedes further into the distance, appearing to shrink in size as the gap between the two individuals increases.
